{"action_insert":"false","action_update":"false","action_delete":"false","action_query":"false","collection":"sys_notification_va_content","advanced":"true","active":"true","when":"before_display","order":"100","add_message":"false","script":"(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
	
				current.script = "(function getNotificationHeadingAndMessage(\r\n" +
				"\t\t\t/*GlideRecord of record changed to cause notification*/ target,\r\n" +
				"\t\t\t/*GlideRecord of event triggered to cause notification*/ event,\r\n" +
				"\t\t\t/*Recipient Table Name*/ recipientTable,\r\n" +
				"\t\t\t/*Recipient Sys Id*/ recipientSysId) {\r\n" +
				"\t\r\n" +
				"\t// var arrayEventParam = event.parm1.split(',');\r\n" +
				"\t// var jsonEventParam = JSON.parse(event.parm2);\r\n" +
				"\t//\r\n" +
				"\t// var recipient = new GlideRecord(recipientTable);\r\n" +
				"\t// recipient.get(recipientSysId);\r\n" +
				"\t// var messageContent = 'Dear ' + recipient.first_name + ', \\r\\n';\r\n" +
				"\t// messageContent += 'Use markdown in message content for ***formatted message***.';\r\n" +
				"\t//\r\n" +
				"\t// Return object using the below format (messageHeading is optional and messageContent is required)\r\n" +
				"\t\r\n" +
				"\treturn {messageHeading:'formattedMessageHeading', messageContent:'formattedMessageContent'};\r\n" +
				"\t\r\n})(target, event, recipientTable, recipientSysId);";

})(current, previous);","abort_action":"false","filter_condition":"","condition":"!current.script","name":"Set default value for empty script field"}
